page.title: 04Trade In Stock
page.content: The Antique shop was a butcher's shop. It has been an Antique shop for 20 years. When it was a butcher's shop they had a barn so it was called Barn Hall. Near the barn was a hayloft in the hayloft was an old pump. During world war one 20 soldiers were billeted in the hayloft.The hayloft was to keep hay in the roof for the animals. In the middle of the dining room behind the Antique shop there was a well.The Antique store room used to be a slaughter house for the butchers. The antique shop was the first building in Stock to have fluorescent light fitted. At night it became alocal land mark as there are no street lights in Stock and so the bright light guided late night revellers to their homes.
